name: calendar-manager
description: Manage calendar events with full CRUD operations, search, and upcoming event queries. Supports recurring events, attendees, reminders, and date range filtering.
author: claw2agent

toolDefinition.name: calendar_manager
toolDefinition.description: Manage calendar events. Create, list, update, delete, search, and query upcoming events. Supports recurring events, attendees, reminders, and date range filtering.

action.description: create (new event), list (all events with optional date range), update (modify event by id), delete (remove event by id), search (keyword search), upcoming (events within time window)

id.description: Event ID (required for update and delete)

startTime.description: Event start time as ISO 8601 string (required for create)

endTime.description: Event end time as ISO 8601 string

attendees.description: List of attendee names or emails

reminders.description: Reminder offsets in minutes before the event

startRange.description: Start of date range filter (ISO 8601) for list action

endRange.description: End of date range filter (ISO 8601) for list action

query.description: Search keyword for the search action

hours.description: Number of hours to look ahead for the upcoming action (default: 24)
